title: Getting AFK/Leaver warnings after update keeps booting me.
body:
So after I updated LoL today i started experiencing a lot of issues. Random disconnects, game becoming unresponsive, cant click champions in champion select, Q-W-E-R keys not working. Game occasionally works properly but I've been booted and forced to CTR+ALT+DEL too many times and now i'm getting an AFK/Leaver warning.

Anyone else experiencing this, also will this affect my account in any way?

replies.body: Firstly, stop going into match-made games until you've fixed this. Look over [this page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and make sure that it's not some silly problem that can be fixed easily.
